item.title: One Hour One Life
item.description: Last Week, Jason Rohrer released his latest game, and it’s full of interesting ideas that are worth having a play with. A couple of years ago, my wife and I created Story of Everyone, which experimented with collaborative content creation and player familial relationships. Given the limitations imposed by the competition, the results were of course limited, but we did find some sort of in-game “culture” building where players would riff off the content contributed by others, creating interesting in-game narratives.
